summary: "Beauty and the Beast" is a popular Disney animated movie from 1991. It's about a prince turned into a monster (the Beast) and a young woman named Belle. Belle is held captive in his castle, but as they spend time together, they learn about love and kindness. The Beast must earn Belle's love to break a curse before the last petal of a magical rose falls. The movie is based on an old fairy tale and has great music and animation, making it a big success and one of Disney's most beloved films. It even inspired a live-action remake and a Broadway musical.
title: Beauty and the Beast (1991 film)
